options: 16:JHS_MarketRestoreOrUpgrade:Open options for restoring or upgrading The Junkhub Ultra
1:JHS_MainHullhub_option:Restore or Upgrade "The Junkhub Ultra" Main hull
2:JHS_LeftModuleHub_option:Restore or Upgrade "The Junkhub Ultra" Left Module
3:JHS_RightModuleHub_option:Restore or Upgrade "The Junkhub Ultra" Right module

script: SetTooltip JHS_AddShieldModule_option "Restores Functionality to shield You have enought credits"

SetTooltip JHS_MainHull_Restore_option "You don't have enought credits"
SetEnabled JHS_MainHull_Restore_option false

JHS_Core_RestoreShip
AddText "$global.uwRestoreShip is $global.JHS_RestoreAfterStr by clearing $global.JHS_RestoreRemovedDMod from the hull, at the cost of $global.JHS_RestoreCostStr credits. $global.JHS_RestoreNumDModsStr"
SetTextHighlightColors hColor bad hColor hColor
SetTextHighlights $global.uwRestoreShip $global.JHS_RestoreRemovedDMod $global.JHS_RestoreCostStr $global.JHS_RestoreNumDModsStrHighlight
FireAll JNS_MainHullOptions

SetTooltip JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_U1_option "Installing this upgrade into $global.uwUpgradeShip requires $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available."
SetTooltipHighlightColors uwMarketUpgradeU1 buttonShortcut buttonShortcut buttonShortcut
SetTooltipHighlights uwMarketUpgradeU1 $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr $player.creditsStr
JHS_AddConfirmation uwMarketUpgradeU1 "Installing a pair of built-in Borer Drone wings into $global.uwUpgradeShip requires $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available. Do you want to proceed?"

JHS_Core_UpgradeShip U1
AddText "Installed a pair of built-in Drone wings and 4 modular wing slots into $global.uwUpgradeShip, at the cost of $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits."
SetTextHighlightColors hColor hColor
SetTextHighlights $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr
FireAll JNS_MainHullOptions

JHS_Core_UpgradeShip U2
AddText "Installed a pair of built-in Drone wings and 4 modular wing slots into $global.uwUpgradeShip, at the cost of $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits."
SetTextHighlightColors hColor hColor
SetTextHighlights $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr
FireAll JNS_MainHullOptions

JHS_Core_UpgradeShip U3
AddText "Installed a pair of built-in Drone wings and 4 modular wing slots into $global.uwUpgradeShip, at the cost of $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits."
SetTextHighlightColors hColor hColor
SetTextHighlights $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr
FireAll JNS_MainHullOptions

JHS_Core_UpgradeShip U4
AddText "Installed a pair of built-in Drone wings and 4 modular wing slots into $global.uwUpgradeShip, at the cost of $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits."
SetTextHighlightColors hColor hColor
SetTextHighlights $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr
FireAll JNS_MainHullOptions

options: 6:JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_U5_option:Replace a built-in Intergrated Targeting Unit with Advanced Targeting Core
6:JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_U5_option:Replace a built-in Intergrated Targeting Unit with Advanced Targeting Core

script:
JHS_Core_UpgradeShip U5
AddText "Installed a pair of built-in Drone wings and 4 modular wing slots into $global.uwUpgradeShip, at the cost of $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits."
SetTextHighlightColors hColor hColor
SetTextHighlights $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr
FireAll JNS_MainHullOptions

SetTooltip JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_M1_option "Installing this upgrade into $global.uwUpgradeShip requires $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available."
SetTooltipHighlightColors uwMarketUpgradeU1 buttonShortcut buttonShortcut buttonShortcut
SetTooltipHighlights JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_M1_option $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr $player.creditsStr
JHS_AddConfirmation JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_M1_option "Rewamping both modules of $global.uwUpgradeShip to use wing slots requires $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available. Do you want to proceed?"

JHS_Core_UpgradeShip M1
AddText "Rewamped $global.uwUpgradeShip to use two carrier modules at the cost of $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits."
SetTextHighlightColors hColor hColor
SetTextHighlights $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr
FireAll JNS_MainHullOptions

JHS_Core_UpgradeShip M2
AddText "Rewamped $global.uwUpgradeShip to use two cargo modules at the cost of $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits."
SetTextHighlightColors hColor hColor
SetTextHighlights $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr
FireAll JNS_MainHullOptions

JHS_Core_UpgradeShip M3
AddText "Rewamped $global.uwUpgradeShip to use one cargo and one carrier modules at the cost of $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr credits."
SetTextHighlightColors hColor hColor
SetTextHighlights $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeU1CostStr
FireAll JNS_MainHullOptions
